title: Riot won't change Fiora back because....
body:
A. They are too arrogant to see the Fiora rework as a mistake
B. They are too ignorant to understand that the Fiora rework was a mistake. 
C. They wanted her to be bad and to become a useless champion. 
D. They wanted to upset me personally banning me from ranked, to destroy my champion and feel no remorse. 
E. They got owned by Fiora test playing the game and never want a real challenge again. 
F. Because they want the entire Fiora loving community to suffer in darkness. 
G. Because they secretly want to sabotage the 1st E-sport.
H. Because they don't like code. 
I. Because they forgot how to change Fiora back. 
J. Because Fiora gives them nightmares. 
K. Because Fiora sounded arrogant so they wanted her to pay with a placebo ult and she isn't finished paying. 
L. Because Riot has more important things to do than cater to old Fiora mains. 
M. Because they can't stop farting whenever they try to bring the old Fiora back.
N. When they try to change to back she has a glitch that destroys all other champs. 
O. After they bring back the old Fiora she comes out of the screen and tries to slash everyone responsible. 
P. When you bring back the old Fiora all the nuclear weapons around the World go live. 
Q. Caring about how people really feel about Fiora gives the developers angina pain.
R. Remembering how amazing the old Fiora is puts the developers in a day dream stupor and are unable to work. 
S. The old Fiora reminds the developers of a conceited X-girlfriend who they hate.
T. The developers are too lazy to fix the game from smoking so much weed. 
U. Riot got jealous and remains jealous of how much better she was than their mains that they have no intention of fixing her. 
V. Riot doesn't want to see me get a level 1 pentakill ever again.
W. When Riot thinks about Fiora little mini Fioras start coming out of the floor to taunt them. 
X. Fiora's family called and said they won't pay the ransom money. 
Y. The new Fiora has a big fit and starts breaking stuff. 
Z. All the developers have turned into clones of Tahm Kench.

replies.body:
her rework is fine wtf.

she was OP when it first came out, but she is in a fine spot now.
You should of voted. You would make a good voter.
fioras fine bb
As the World greatest Fiora of all time...  She is not FINE or I wouldn't be here daily to tell you she is not FINE.

Thanks, I needed that chuckle.

What's the highest you ever ranked, if I may be so bold?
Considering their other account R3PORTED... Bronze 3.
Can you stop spamming "I'm the best old Fiora main ever"? Nobody will think that's true because it's just not true.

Actually  it is true. 

Famous for my level 1 pentakills... 
And trolling low elo with 40 and 0 scores. just to lose the match. 
I have played Fiora more than the entire Riot crew has played any champ combined.
Haven't answered my question yet
My question is: Why do you even try to troll? It's too obvious.
Stop spamming your god damn shitposts
Stop spamming my "shitpost" with your spam opinion.   Go spam your spam on some other spam spammer.
https://media.giphy.com/media/tLql6mMHC6wvK/giphy.gif
He used the foil called "logic demanter" of course.
http://www.relatably.com/m/img/salty-memes/image.jpg

YOOOOOOOOOOOOOU PEOPLE RUINED MY CHAMPION!  
YOU WHO HAVE UP VOTES INSTEAD OF DOWN VOTES!

                  IN THE GAME...  I KILL YOU!
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/65731411.jpg
Why do we keep giving this person attention though?
So we can farm upvotes by shitposting that he/she shitposts, why?
Dunno
Both?
http://i.imgur.com/IP73r.gif?Noredirect
I'd post that image where you have the asian guy who can't read the paper but I don't have the pict : ^)

You're right, let's go back to the good old days of rush a Ravenous Hydra and then get to deal tons of AoE damage without any counter play what so ever. That'll be just what everyone wants!

Better yet, today we have Titanif Hydra! Tank, untargetable AoE damage! It's a combination of what everyone has always wanted! Slap a Frozen Mallet in there and you got yourself a Tank, Untargetable, CC, AoE damage ultimate! Amazing balance! 10/10

As the World's greatest challenger Fiora I felt pretty juked when they ruined my champ. 

Once the greatest Fiora of all time. 
Once famous for my level one pentakills... 
Is now only famous for non-intent feeding with a nerfed champ that only  rarely gets op.
Upvoting for effort tho. One reason for each letter of the alphabet.
UPDATE: Read through it all. Wish more people would read and see the humor on it.
